bucketNameOverride.title: Bucket name override
bucketNameOverride.description: By default, the bucket will be called after the Module. If this field is provided, it will override the bucket name

bucketType.title: Bucket use case
bucketType.description:
Select use case for your bucket: testing - expires objects after 3 days
production - retains 3 current versions after 30 days
website - configures static hosting pointing to index.html

blockPublicACLs.title: Block Public ACLs
blockPublicACLs.description: S3 will block public access permissions applied to newly added buckets or objects, and prevent the creation of new public access ACLs for existing buckets and objects. This setting doesnâ€™t change any existing permissions that allow public access to S3 resources using ACLs

blockPublicPolicy.title: Block Public Policy
blockPublicPolicy.description: S3 will block new bucket and access point policies that grant public access to buckets and objects. This setting doesn't change any existing policies that allow public access to S3 resources

ignorePublicACLs.title: Ignore Public ACLs
ignorePublicACLs.description: S3 will ignore all ACLs that grant public access to buckets and objects

restrictPublicBuckets.title: Restrict Public Buckets
restrictPublicBuckets.description: S3 will ignore public and cross-account access for buckets or access points with policies that grant public access to buckets and objects
